name: Elphinstone, Inc.
headline: Robo-advisory platform for Pakistan
description: We're building the equivalent of 401ks for Pakistan as the first step towards building a comprehensive wealth management platform for the country.

founders.name: Farooq Tirmizi, Founder
founders.description: First time founder of a startup; worked for 12 years in financial services and financial journalism in both Pakistan and the United States before jumping ship to start this company. I hope to build a company that long outlives me.

## To open an individual USA investment account to buy USA stocks , head to [Elphinstone.us](https://elphinstone.com.pk/<https:/elphinstone.us/>)
## Welcome toa hassle-freeretirement plan
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20viewBox=%220%200%20851%20720%22%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Elphinstone can provide you a VPS-based corporate retirement plan that is free and can be set up almost instantly.
[ GET STARTED ](https://elphinstone.com.pk/<https:/business.elphinstone.com.pk/login>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20viewBox=%220%200%20851%20720%22%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20viewBox=%220%200%20622%201024%22%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Choose VPS
A Voluntary Pension Scheme is cheaper and easier than Gratuity Fund or a Provident Fund. 
Trust us – your employees will thank you later.
[ LEARN MORE ](https://elphinstone.com.pk/<https:/elphinstone.com.pk/pricing/>)
## No FBR paperwork.We promise.
Elphinstone’s onboarding team will handle the hassle of setting up your corporate retirement plan – so that both you and your employees can rest easy. 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20viewBox=%220%200%20770%20663%22%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Choosing the best stocks for your employees
Elphinstone partners only with the asset management companies that offer the best funds for each asset class and offers funds to clients managed by UBL Fund Managers and MCB-Arif Habib

## © 2023 Elphinstone Pakistan Ltd
##### **Disclosures and Disclaimers**
Elphinstone, Inc. (“Elphinstone”) offers SmartRupee, a software-based advice engine that delivers financial planning tools to help users achieve better outcomes. All information provided by Elphinstone’s financial planning tool is for illustrative purposes only and you should not rely on such information as the primary basis of your investment, financial, or tax planning decisions. Securities advisory services are provided by Elphinstone Pakistan Ltd (“Elphinstone Pakistan”), a Securities Advisor licensed by the Securities and Exchanges Commission of Pakistan. Elphinstone Pakistan is a subsidiary of Elphinstone, Inc., a Registered Investment Advisor with the United States Securities and Exchanges Commission. Please see our Full Disclosure for important details. SmartRupee is a service currently offered only to citizens of Pakistan – whether they reside within Pakistan or abroad – or residents of Pakistan who are non-citizens. By using this website, you understand the information being presented is provided for informational purposes only and agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Elphinstone and Elphinstone Pakistan rely on information from various sources believed to be reliable, including clients and third parties, but cannot guarantee the accuracy and completeness of that information. Elphinstone and Elphinstone Pakistan do not provide tax advice and investors are encouraged to consult with their personal tax advisors. Investments in securities: **No Deposit Insurance • No Bank Guarantee • May Lose Value.** All investing involves risk, including the possible loss of money you invest, and past performance does not guarantee future results. Historical returns expected returns, and probability projections are provided for informational and illustrative purposes, and may not reflect actual future performance. Not an offer, solicitation of an offer, or advice to buy or sell securities in jurisdictions where Elphinstone is not registered. Use of the name and logo of (bank/sponsor) as given above does not mean that is responsible for the liabilities/obligations of (asset management company) or any investment scheme managed by it.

generated_description:
Elphinstone, Inc. is a fintech company that emerged from the innovative climate of 2020 in Pakistan, thanks to support from Y Combinator's W22 batch. The company operates with a clear mission: to build a robo-advisory platform tailored for the Pakistani market, akin to the familiar 401(k) retirement plans in the U.S. Essentially, they're taking a significant leap in providing a comprehensive wealth management service designed to cater to the financial needs of individuals and businesses in Pakistan.

Located in Pakistan, the team behind Elphinstone is relatively small but focused, consisting of 15 skilled professionals. They’ve partnered with the asset management group "nan" to bolster their offerings, ensuring users have access to reputable and effective investment options. The fintech industry is not just a buzzword for them; it’s a commitment to reshaping how wealth management is perceived and accessed in the region.

Currently, Elphinstone promotes a range of financial products, notably a Voluntary Pension Scheme (VPS) that allows companies to establish corporate retirement plans with ease. They aim to eliminate the tediousness of paperwork, providing a seamless experience from setup to management. They ensure that their clients have access to some of the best funds and investment options, collaborating with established asset management firms like UBL Fund Managers and MCB-Arif Habib.

This ambitious startup is set on a trajectory to empower individuals and businesses to achieve financial security without the usual frictions associated with investing in Pakistan. You can find more about their endeavors and explore their offerings on their official website: [elphinstone.com.pk](https://elphinstone.com.pk/).

In summary, Elphinstone, Inc. is tackling a crucial gap in Pakistan's financial landscape with their innovative approach to robo-advisory and a commitment to making wealth management accessible for all.
